name: Automated artifact extraction from app data
description: The use of automation to extract pieces of data that are potentially useful for a digital forensic investigation from app data.
details: Artifacts extracted may be a direct mapping to lower levels of abstraction e.g. a database field 'message content' may map to an artifact 'message content', but in many cases, automated interpretation is applied where a field such as 'flag' containing numeric values, may be mapped to more meaningful text strings in the extracted artifact.
